name: Bill Kirchen
description: '''William Knight Kirchen''' (born June 29, 1948) is an American guitarist, singer and songwriter. He was a member of [[Commander Cody and His Lost Planet Airmen]] from 1967 to the mid-1970s and later worked with [[Nick Lowe]]. ''Guitar Player'' magazine described Kirchen as "Titan of The [[Telecaster]]" for his prowess on the guitar.
